name: Vikings With Guns
description:
You play as Utgard  the last viking warrior stranding on a land with nothing but the dead. With some help from the future you may have a chance! Each level up a dice is rolled limiting or opening up your options for upgrades. Test your luck!

Art & Programming - Shmador

Sound - Daniel Hadad

--Bugs--

Leveling up too fast, Exp required stays the same unintentionally.
